bwwExcerpt: A one-joke sketch dragged out to, er, ungodly lengths, "An Act of God" feels like little more than a cash grab designed to prey on tourists drawn to its well-known star and cutesy premise. (I didn't see the Jim Parsons version, so this was my first encounter with the material....
